subject: #SSN4219
description_text:
Hi is there any update on my order?
#SSN4219

I'm just waiting to hear if you've cancelled the order or shipped it.
Thank you,Brandon Le

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Le,    Due to a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse, the processing of your order has been affected. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a bit more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.
ID 为 7180 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7180  
      主题: ORDER #SSN4219  
      描述:  Hi can you please cancel my order #SSN4219?  I accidentally ordered the pedals without the clutch. I will submit another order for the correct ones.   Thank you, Brandon Le.

Could you please change it to the one with the clutch instead?

>
Hi Brandon Le,  Your package has already been shipped, and I'm sorry we cannot replace it for you.     https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ201H40306746203/trackdetails
I sent an email an hour after I ordered it to cancel the order. Did you guys not receive the email?
Hi Brandon Le,    No need to worry—you only need to pay the difference, and we'll ship the clutch to you with no additional shipping charges.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
I've already submitted a new order for the one with the clutch. I'll just return the original one.

Can I start the return process for Order # #SSN4219.
Reason: Shipping error on your part.
Thank you,Brandon Le

Or can you cancel my new order SSN4377

>
Hi Brandon Le,    Alright, we'll cancel your original order #SSN4219 and reship a clutch instead, so you won't need to return it. Is that acceptable?
